campaign.story:
The Project
Following our successful Goetia sigil pin set we have decided to launch a similar full set of sigils in the form of coins, since coins are easier than pins to mold, make, finish, package and ship this full set of sigils has more affordable rewards.
The full set of Lesser Key Of Solomon Demon Seal coins, booklets and pouch
The Lesser Key of Solomon Information
Since it is a 17th century book, The Lesser Key of Solomon is in the public domain and has been digitized by google and is available for download here Archive.org link
If you have an interest in Demonology then The Lesser Key of Solomon:Goetia is a must have. As it lists the 72 demons, seals and the means of summoning them.
The following illustrations have been taken from the book and show the same 80 seals that will be shown on the coins.
(this is the same image from my previous Kickstarter)
The title page and the 80 seals listed (8 demons have an alternate seal also)
About the solid metal coins
Coins are about the same size as a US nickel (3/4 inch) and are solid metal single sided antique finished with a great feel to them.
The coins will be made from a zinc alloy metal that is strong and durable
UPDATE Stretch Goal #7 REACHED coins will be made larger, about the size of a US quarter which is almost 1 inch about 22mm-24mm, since the coins are irregular shaped some maybe be smaller or larger
UPDATE Stretch Goal #8 Coins will be available 2 sided with demon names on the back, or the original blank backs
PLAY

The sigils designs are raised from the coins for a quality feel.
Raised sigil designs
A worn design and an antique finish gives them the appearance of a 1000 year old coin.
The look of an ancient coin
Coins are single sided
The full set of coins weigh about 1/2 pound and will come with a set of 3 booklets and a velvet carrying pouch.
Booklets and velvet carrying pouch
Information Booklet
Three approximately 4x5 inch booklets included with every set list the demons and their abilities
The 3 information booklets
Volume 1 lists the Kings and Dukes (36 pages)
Volume 2 has Prince's and Marquis (24 pages)
Volume 3 for the Counts, Presidents and the Knight's (22 pages)
An alphabetical index makes finding your demons page easy.
Booklet index
Each Demons abilities are listed and the seal shown so you can identify your coins.
Demon seal and abilities page
Stretch Goals
Each stretch goal reward will be included with every set there is no additional purchase needed
First stretch goal at $3000
Goal #1 $3000 Solomon's seal coin with the same worn design and antique finish as the Goetia coins. REACHED
Solomons secret seal coin
Goal #2 $5000 Solomon's pentacles coin REACHED
Solomons Pentacle coin
Goal #3 $7000 Solomon's seal pendant (at this level I will include one of my Solomon Seal pendants) REACHED
Solomons Seal necklace
Goal #4 $9000  Solomon's pentacle pendant REACHED
Solomon,s Pentacle pendant
Goal #5 $11000  Solomon's disc REACHED
Solomon's disc pendant
Goal #6  $15000 pentacle of Solomon's ring REACHED
Yes at this level I will include a Solomon's Pentacle ring (any size 7 to 14)
Solomons Pentacle ring
Solomons Pentacle ring side view
Goal #7 $25,000 Larger sized coins- coins will be made larger, about the size of a US quarter which is almost 1 inch about 23mm-24mm REACHED
Goal #8 $50,000 Coins will be available 2 sided with demon names on the back, or the original blank backs REACHED
Size reference of the old size and the new larger size
Showing the front and back design with the old coin size and a US quarter for reference (for EU backers a US quarter is 24mm about the size of a 1 Euro coin)
The 2 sided design has the Hebrew initial as listed in the Dr Rudd chart illustrated in the Goetia and also the number as stated in the demon descriptions
You will have a choice of a plain back set or a 2 sided set
Plain back or named, numbered, and Hebrew initialed back
Showing back design, old size front and new size front
Another old and new size example
Goal #9 and beyond ???.
The Demon List
 (this is the same list from my previous Kickstarter)
1. King Baal --- Teaches the art of invisibility
2. Duke Agares --- Makes runaways come back, teaches languages, destroys temporal and supernatural dignities, earthquakes
3. Prince Vassago --- Declares past and future, discovers hidden and lost things
4. Marquis Samigina --- Teaches liberal sciences, tells of souls of those who died in sin and who drowned in the sea
5. President Marbas --- reveals hidden or secret things, causes and heals diseases, teaches mechanical arts, and changes people into other shapes
6. Duke Valefor --- Tempts people to steal and creates good relationships among thieves
 7. Marquis Amon --- tells of all things past and future, procures feuds, and reconciles controversies between friends and foes
8. Duke Barbatos --- Gives understanding of the voices the animals, says past and future, conciliates friends and rulers, and can lead you to hidden treasures
9. King Paimon --- Teaches all arts, philosophies and sciences, and secret things, can reveal all mysteries of the Earth, wind and water, gives good familiars, dignities and confirms them, binds men to you
10. President Buer --- Teaches Natural and Moral Philosophy, Logic, and the virtues of all herbs and plants, heals all infirmities, and gives good familiars
11. Duke Gusion --- Tells all past, present and future things, shows the meaning of all questions that are asked to him, reconciles friends, and gives honor and dignity
12. Prince Sitri --- Causes men to love women and vice versa, and can make people bare themselves naked if desired
13. King Beleth --- Gives all the love of men and women he is commanded
14. Marquis Leraie --- He causes great battles and disputes, and makes gangrene wounds caused by arrows
15. Duke Eligos --- Discovers hidden things and knows the future of wars and how soldiers should meet, attracts the favor of lords, knights and other important persons
16. Duke Zepar --- Causes women to love men, and bring them together in love. He makes women barren. He is depicted with red clothes and armor, like a soldier
17. Count Botis --- Tells of all things past and future, and reconciles friends and foes
18. Duke Bathin --- Tells the virtues of precious stones and herbs, and can bring men suddenly from one country to another
19. Duke Sallos --- Causes men to love women and women to love men (Weyer does not mention the nature of his work
20. King Purson --- knows of hidden things, can find treasures, and tells past, present and future, also brings good familiars
21. Count Marax --- Teaches Astronomy and all other liberal sciences, and gives good and wise familiars that know the virtues of all herbs and precious stones
22. Count/Prince Ipos --- Reveals all things, past, present and future, can make men witty and valiant
23. Duke Aim --- Sets cities, castles and great places on fire, makes men witty in all ways, and gives true answers concerning private matters
24. Marquis Naberius --- Makes you cunning in all arts, but especially in rhetoric, restores lost dignities and honors
25. President Glasya-Labolas --- Tells all things past and to come, gains the minds and love of friends and foes causing love among them if desired, incites homicides and can make you invisible.
26. Duke Buné --- Changes the place of the dead, makes you eloquent and wise, and gives true answers to their demands and also richness
27. Marquis Ronové --- Teaches Rhetoric, languages, and gives good and loyal servants and the favour of friends and foes.
28. Duke Berith --- Tells things of the past, present and future with true answers, turns all metals into gold, gives dignities to men
29. Duke Astaroth --- Teaches mathematical sciences and handicrafts, can make you invisible and lead you to hidden treasures, and answers every question
30. Marquis Forneus --- Teaches Rhetoric and languages, gives men a good name, and makes them be loved by their friends and foes.
31. President Foras --- Teaches logic and ethics in all their branches, the virtues of all herbs and precious stones, can make you witty, eloquent, invisible, and live long, and can discover treasures and recover lost things.
32. King Asmoday --- Teaches Arithmetic, Astronomy, Geometry, and all handicrafts, makes you invincible, and finds treasure
33. Prince Gaap --- Teaches Philosophy and all liberal sciences, can cause love or hate and make men insensible and invisible, deliver familiars out of the custody of other magicians, gives true answers concerning past, present and future, and can carry and re-carry men and things speedily
34. Count Furfur --- Causes love between a man and a woman, creates storms, tempests, thunder, lightning, and blasts, and teaches on secret and divine things.
35. Marquis Marchosias --- Strong in battle, gives true answers to all questions
36. Prince Stolas Teaches astronomy and the knowledge of poisonous plants, herbs and precious stones.
37. Marquis Phenex --- Teaches all wonderful sciences, is an excellent poet, and is very obedient to the conjuror.
 38. Count Halphas --- Builds towers and fills them with ammunition and weapons, an armorer of sorts. He is a prince of Hell. He is also said to send his legions into battle, or to places designated by higher commanding demons.
39. Earl Malphas --- Builds houses, high towers and strongholds, throws down the buildings of the enemies, can destroy your enemies' desires or thoughts and all they have done, gives good familiars
 40. Count Raum --- Steals treasures out of kings' houses, carrying them where he wishes, and destroys cities and dignities of men, also tells things past, present and future, reconcile friends and foes, and invoke love.
 41. Duke Focalor --- Kills men, drowns them, and overthrows warships; but if commanded by the conjuror he will not harm any man or thing, has power over wind and sea
 42. Duke Vepar --- Governs the waters and guides armoured ships laden with ammunition and weapons;can make the sea rough and stormy, and to appear full of ships, and can make men die in three days by putrefying sores and wounds, causing worms to breed in them
43. Marquis Sabnock --- Builds high towers, castles and cities, furnishing them with weapons, ammunition, etc., gives good familiars, and can afflict men for several days making their wounds and sores gangrenous or filling them with worms.
 44. Marquis Shax --- Takes away the sight, hearing and understanding of any person and steals money out of kings' houses, carrying it back to the people, also steals horses and everything else, can discover hidden things, and sometimes gives good familiars
 45. King Vine --- Tell present, past and future, discovers witches and hidden things, creates storms and makes the water rough by means of them, and also brings down walls and builds towers
46. Count Bifrons --- Teaches sciences and arts, the virtues of the gems and woods, herbs, and changes corpses from their original grave into other places, sometimes putting magic lights on the graves that seem like candles.
 47. Duke Vual --- Gives the love of women, causes friendship between friends and foes, and tells things past, present and to come.
48. President Haagenti --- Makes men wise by instructing them in every subject, transmutes all metals into gold, and changes wine into water and water into wine
49. Duke Crocell --- Teaches geometry and other liberal sciences, also warms bodies of water, creates the illusion of the sound of rushing waters, and reveals the location of natural baths.
50. Knight Furcas --- Teaches Philosophy, Astronomy, Rhetoric, Logic, Chiromancy and Pyromancy.
51. King Balam --- Tells things past, present, and to come, and can also make men invisible and witty.
52. Duke Alloces --- Provides good familiars, teaches astronomy and liberal arts.
53. President Camio --- A good disputer, gives the understanding of the voices of birds, bullocks, dogs, and other creatures, and of the noise of the waters too, and gives true answers concerning things to come.
54. Duke Murmur --- Teaches Philosophy, and can oblige the souls of the deceased to appear before you to answer every desired question.
55. Prince Orobas --- Gives true answers of things past, present and to come, divinity, and the creation of the world, confers dignities and prelacies, and the favour of friends and foes
56. Duke Gremory --- Tells all things past, present and future, about hidden treasures, and procures the love of women, young and old, but especially maidens.
57. President Ose --- Makes you wise in all liberal sciences and gives true answers concerning divine and secret things, also brings insanity to any person you wish, making him/her believe that he/she is the creature or thing the magician desired, or makes that person think he is a king and wearing a crown, or a Pope.
58. President Amy --- Makes you marvelous at astrologie, and all the liberal sciences, gives excellent familiars, reveals treasures
59. Marquis Orias --- Teaches the virtues of the stars and the mansions of the planets, also gives dignities, prelacies, and the favour of friends and foes, and can change you into any shape.
60. Duke Vapula --- Teaches Philosophy, Mechanics, and sciences.
61. King Zagan --- Makes men witty, can also turn wine into water, water into wine, and blood into wine, turns metals into coins that are made with that metal
62. President Valac --- Gives true answers about hidden treasures, reveals where serpents can be seen, and delivers them harmless to you
63. Marquis Andras --- Sows discord among people.
64. Duke Haures --- Gives true answers of all things past, present and future, also destroys all your enemies by burning them up.
65. Marquis Andrealphus --- Raises great noises and teaches cunning in astronomy, teaches geometry, and can turn any man into a bird.
66. Marquis Cimeies --- Locates lost or hidden treasures, teaches grammar, logic and rhetoric, and makes you into a warrior of his own likeness.
67. King Amdusias --- Causes all types of musical instruments to be heard but not seen, makes trees bend.
68. King Belial --- Distributes senatorships and gives excellent familiars.
69. Marquis Decarabia --- Teaches the virtues of all herbs and precious stones, and can change into all birds and sing and fly like them
70. Prince Seere --- Brings things to pass suddenly, transports anywhere, discovers thefts
71. Duke Dantalion --- Teaches all arts and sciences, and knows the thoughts of all people. Causes love and shows visions of any person.
72. Count Andromalius --- Brings back thieves and stolen goods, discovers and punishes thieves and the wicked, discovers hidden treasures.

updates.update_content:
I apologize if this update is not wanted but many past backers have asked me to update when i have launched a new project.
My new project is for Solomon's keys, the 44 planet pentacles
I have designed this project to be the most affordable coin project I have done so far. The coins are single sided and 22mm in diameter and there will be no stretch goals but because of these changes we are able to set the reward pricing to a very low $20

updates.update_userinfo: My UK shipping partners new "Goetia - The Card Game + full set of metal Demon Seal coins" project
updates.update_content:
After my last update (about my new tarot coin project) I had a few backers mention that they missed all the early birds on my new tarot project (actually it was a bit more than a few) and that was my mistake as I didn't know if there would be any interest in the tarot coins from the backers of Goetia coins.
Well I learned my lesson and will not make that mistake again so this update is to notify all my Goetia coin backers of my UK shipping partner Devil Inside Productions new project "Goetia - The Card Game + full set of metal Demon Seal coins"
Its not launched yet since I asked him to wait a day or two so I can let my Goetia coin backers get the first shot at the early birds. (my way of apologizing for not getting the tarot coin early birds)

updates.update_userinfo: Update for a new Tarot Coin project
updates.update_content:
Hi All
Just a quick message so my previous backers can check out my new project if interested
My new Tarot coin project 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/casting/coins-of-the-tarot-metal-coins-for-tarot-readings

updates.update_userinfo: Coin wrapup and new project links
updates.update_content:
Well it took a long time but we are pretty much done except for a few stragglers and some address issues
Shipping status
USA rewards have all been shipped and should be delivered by now as the last packages went out 3 weeks ago

I hope everyone is doing well
A small bit of bad news to report
As the last shipment of EU rewards arrived in the UK there was damaged box and over 100 coin sets are missing along with a large number of rings. 
The good news is since I am the manufacturer I am able to start making the replacements right away and hopefully within 3 weeks I will have the last of the US/International rewards shipped and the UK/EU replacements on their way.

updates.update_userinfo: Final push to ship the remaining rewards
updates.update_content:
Sorry for the lack of updates lately, I have been a bit busy trying to make a final push to get all the rewards out before the end of this month and so far it looks like we will be very close and get most of the rewards shipped by then.
The backer numbers that have shipped are a bit out of order now since we are just kinda shipping whats ready to go (the size 7 rings are ready so we send out those rewards etc...) as its a bit easier to package all the same types. With 8 sizes of 2 different rings and the 1or2 sided coin choice makes it so its almost like a custom order for each package. (lesson learned about having many options).

updates.update_userinfo: Coin casting is finished, over 350 thousand coins made.
updates.update_content:
Hi all, sorry for the delayed update.
After the better part of a year casting has come to a close, over 350,000 coins where cast in total, that comes to about 18000 spin cycles and with pouring the metal, spin time, and de-molding each cycle took about 2 minutes so I spent about 36,000 minutes spin casting this past year about 600 hours just for spinning. 
A few more days of finishing is left and then that will be completed also and the coins will be ready to be made into sets. (about 1800 sets left to make)

updates.update_userinfo: EU shipping to backer #1000 has been dispatched from the UK
updates.update_content:
Hi All
The US and International rewards are business as usual with nothing new to report, just readying up the next batch (just casting coins, finishing coins, making rings etc..)
Letting everyone know whats going on with the EU rewards.
EU rewards up to backer #1000 have been dispatched from the UK this past few days, many may have already been delivered or should arrive very soon.

updates.update_userinfo: Rewards for backer number 1600 and below have been shipped
updates.update_content:
Hi All
Shipped another batch Friday and Monday, if your backer number is 1600 or below  your rewards have been shipped.
The EU rewards up to backer #1000 arrived in the UK this week but still need to be processed and repackaged for shipping.

updates.update_userinfo: Rewards for backer number 1000 and below have been shipped
updates.update_content:
Hi All
Shipped another batch Friday, if your backer number is 1000 or below your rewards have been shipped or will be at the post office on Monday.
The EU test fulfillment seems to have run very well so the EU rewards up to backer #1000 will be sent to the forwarder this week. The process is I send the rewards to a freight forwarder in Florida and they send them on to the UK where they are packaged and then sent to the backers. The test batch took a bit longer than normal since it was a learning process for me but hopefully this batch is much faster.

campaign.story:
UPDATE 7/30/2018 - I found a few more boxes of "Imagined Realms Book 2," so I've updated the available amount on the Book Bundle tier. :) 
UPDATE 7/25/2018 - After some searching, I found a way to get cheaper international shipping on most tiers; I cannot adjust the existing tiers, but I have made new International Only tiers reflecting the lower cost. My apologies for the mixup! Please switch your pledges as necessary, and see Update #2  for more info. 
Hi! My name is Julie Dillon, and I'm a 3-time Hugo Award winning artist from Northern California. I absolutely love to draw and paint, and art has been a vital part of my life for as long as I can remember.  Art can offer an escape as well as an invitation; a way to process one's experience of the world, a way to offer a different perspective. It can illuminate and reveal the magic lurking just beneath the surface of the world, and that is what I've attempted to do throughout my career as an artist.   
I've put together an art book that will let me share with you more of my art and ideas than I ever have before. I have assembled and curated over 200 pages of artwork that includes everything from my portfolio highlights,  freelance work, sketches and studies, unfinished pieces, to old work from when I was first starting out. 
The Book: "Daydreamer's Journey"  
"Daydreamer's Journey" will be a 200 page 8.5" x 11" hardcover book, on beautiful thick glossy paper. This book will contain personal work,  freelance projects, sketches, studies, and illustration drafts, some of which either has never been posted online or that hasn't been available online in over a decade. Also included will be my commentary and thoughts, as well as progress shots for most pieces so you can see part of my painting and brainstorming process. 
Mockup of the printed book
Sample Interior Spread
In addition to my portfolio pieces, I've also included some older art from the early 2000s: 
 As well as tons of sketches and unfinished illustrations: 
Sample Interior Spread
Please note! There will be VERY LIMITED AVAILABILITY of this book after the kickstarter concludes, so if you want a copy, don't wait!  
Rewards
  Note: If you select a reward tier with a giclee or metal print, you will be able to select which image you want on the Kickstarter Survey that will be emailed out after the end of the campaign. 
UPDATE: I was able to find lower rates for international shipping, so there are now new INTERNATIONAL tiers for most rewards that reflect the lower cost. Please either message me with questions or refer to Update #2 for more information. Thank you!
Add-ons and Extras: 
-If you purchased a book at the $25 or $30 reward tier, and would like to have it signed, please add $5. (All the books on the higher reward tiers will be signed). 
-Add $20 per extra 5" x 7" print pack. 
-Add $30 per extra Hardcover Book (plus additional $30 for international shipping)
-Add $35 per extra 8.5" x 11" print pack (plus $10 for international shipping)
-$50 to add an additional giclee print. (If you are adding a 2nd giclee print to one of the giclee reward tiers, no additional shipping is needed. If you are adding a giclee to a non-giclee reward tier, please add $15 international shipping.)
-$220 per extra metal print (add $40 for international shipping).
Stretch Goals
-$30,000 - If we reach this amount, will be able to add 8 extra pages to the book, bringing total to 208 pages. 
-$40,000 - Another 8 extra pages of content, bringing total to 216 pages.
-$65,000 - At this amount I will be able to upgrade everyone's hardcover books to beautiful cloth-bound editions with foil stamped covers and a glossy dust jacket.
-More to be added as needed! 
Thank you! 
Music in video: http://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
In the past, I have successfully shipped two previous art books on time using Kickstarter, so I feel like I have a good handle on what to expect and how to best get quality books and artwork to you in a timely manner. In the case of unforeseen setbacks, I will be very clear in my communication with you to let you know what is going on and the steps I will be taking to deal with the situation. 

I receive payment from kickstarter two weeks after the end of the campaign, at which point I will begin the process of printing the books right away. The books are being printed overseas, and should arrive at my location 40 days after my approval of the proofs from the printer. I will do everything I can to get your books and artwork to you as quickly as possible. I am confident I can have everything delivered to you by the winter holidays. :)
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
As of this morning, all physical packages have been shipped! Everything should be arriving soon, if it hasn't already. 
If you haven't filled out your survey yet, and end up filling it out in the next few weeks, please be advised that I will be in the process of moving for the next several weeks, and won't be able to get to your order until after I am settled in mid-late December. 
Thanks again, everyone, for helping to make this project a reality. :)

Hello everyone, 
After a little holdup in customs, the pallets of books are scheduled to arrive at my place this afternoon, which means I can start shipping them out to you starting tomorrow. :)  If your address has changed, please update it as soon as possible, and if you haven't filled out your reward survey, please do so now, or else I won't know where to ship your books and/or art. 
Thanks!
Julie

Hi everyone! 
I've had a few people asking if they could add extra items to their order, as well as several people indicating on the surveys that they wanted additional items that they hadn't paid for during the campaign. Unfortunately, since I did not use a third party pledge manager, there is no official way to add on to your orders now that the kickstarter campaign is over, but since there has been a decent amount of interest, I'm going to offer manual add-ons, with a few restrictions.

Hi everyone! 
I have sent the digital bundle out to everyone who has filled out their surveys so far; check for an email from gumroad.com (check your spam folder if you don't see it), which hopefully got sent out a few minutes ago *fingers crossed.* If you have trouble downloading the file, please let me know. :) Also, If you have not yet filled out your surveys, please do so at your earliest convenience so I can get an accurate count for print packs and giclees and such. :)

The print proofs have arrived from the printer, have been edited and corrected, and approved for final print!  :) I am expecting the books to arrive by late October, and will let you know when that happens. 
In the meantime, I have sent backer surveys out, so check your spam filters if you haven't received one yet. (For those in the $40 tier, there was a small issue with your survey - I have sent a message out explaining the situation, please contact me if you have any questions).

As of last night, the campaign is over! Huzzah! I've had some time to collapse on the couch and take a breather, and now I can get back to work. :) 
Thank you to everyone who pledged, everyone who retweeted and reblogged and helped share the word, everyone who had a kind word to offer along the way. (And shout-out to you handful of folks who slid in with seconds left on the deadline, haha ♥) I am humbled and amazed by your support, and I thank you from the bottom of my heart.
We hit stretch goal #2 this weekend, which means the book will now be 216 pages! Thank you so much for your support and generosity. Two days left to go! :D

We've blown through the first stretch goal and are well on our way to the 2nd! Thank you so much, everyone! ♥
I've added two more paintings to the print packs, taking the total up to 11 prints per print pack! These are also available as selections for fine art giclee and metal prints, as well as the "Book + single 8.5x11 print" tier.

updates.update_userinfo: We are funded! Plus, new illustration added!
updates.update_content:
We have officially hit the targeted funding goal!! Thank you all so much, I am humbled by your generosity and support. ♥
I have also finished up a new illustration, below, that will be automatically included in the print packs for those who pledged at one of the print pack tiers, and that will be available as a fine art giclee or fine art metal print choice.

campaign.story:
"Pastoral is a romp through subject matter that makes me supremely happy. I refuse to intellectualize it further than that. Expect humor, expect sensuality, expect chickens, expect all three in one image. If that sounds like a damn good time to you I think we will get along famously."
--J.A.W. Cooper
New works being drawn for the bonus 16 pages. Now unlocked! The book is now 128 pages.
Stretch goals are unlocked! We're adding an extra 16 pages worth of new art by J.A.W. Cooper to Pastoral! All pledges of $35 or more receive two bonus 10 x 10 inch mini-prints. Thank you!
Campaign ends on Thursday, July 12th, 8pm PST!
Welcome! J.A.W. Cooper and Flesk have teamed up again to bring you her latest art book Pastoral, along with two new premium signed giclée prints. Cooper’s book is available in two editions: An affordable hardcover, and as an exquisite deluxe signed edition in slipcase that is limited to only 100 copies. Please see the samples and details below. Thank you for visiting!
Mature Warning: This book contains lots of asses, some butts, and other natural stuff as well. We think the nudity is tasteful and the humor is playful, nevertheless you may want to use your discretion if you are gifting this book to anybody under 18.
Pastoral is filled with Cooper's energetic, expressive pencil and ink drawings of wildlife and their stewards. Gouache works from her travels and her most recent gallery paintings also appear.
Hardcover Art Book
The Pastoral hardcover book is 128 pages at 11.5 x 12 inches. The page count has been increase to 128 pages after unlocking our first stretch goal! Over 170 previously unpublished works are collected.
Sample spread from Pastoral
Sample spread from Pastoral
Deluxe Signed Hardcover Book
The Pastoral deluxe edition is limited to only 100 signed and numbered copies in slipcase, of which 80 are available for sale through this Kickstarter campaign. Note that the previously noted edition of 200 has been reduced to only 100. 128 page 11.5” x 12” hardcover art book.
Sample spread from Pastoral
Sample spread from Pastoral
Premium Signed and Numbered Giclée Prints
Only available to our Kickstarter supporters during this campaign!
J.A.W. Cooper's "Safe Passage" is only available for the first 3 days of this campaign. It will be limited to the quantity ordered.
J.A.W. Cooper's "Fruition" will be limited to the quantity ordered during this 30-day campaign.

Stag Enamel Pin
This two piece Stag and leg enamel pin set is only available in select tiers that include the book and signed giclée print(s). Please see the tiers for details. The Stag pin is exclusive to this Kickstarter campaign.
The design shown above is a taste of what the pin set will look like. Please note that the design may fluctuate slightly during production based upon what is feasible with the pin manufacturer.
Kickstarter Bonus Mini-Print!
Exclusive Kickstarter Bonus Mini-Print! We will include a free 10 x 10 inch print with all pledges of $35 or more.

Stretch Goals
Stretch goals allow us to thank you for your growing support by rewarding you with exclusive bonus items just for our Kickstarter supporters.
1. UNLOCKED: We are Adding an additional 16 pages of art to Pastoral. Thank you for your support!
2. UNLOCKED: We are adding the "Shitty Critters" 10 x 10" mini-print to all pledges of $35 or more.
All Kickstarter stretch goal bonus items are limited to one per backer.
Original Art Packages
For those who are eager to donate to this project more generously we would love to show our gratitude for your support with a signed original drawing in addition to the Pastoral deluxe edition book, both "Safe Passage" and "Fruition" fine art prints, the Stag enamel pin, and all of the special bonus Kickstarter goodies. This tier ships in three packages.
The original art title and specifications can be found underneath each sample below. The dimensions reference the paper size.
Donkey Scratching (2018) - 12"x9" - Graphite on 50lb acid-free bond paper
Horse Sketch (2018) - 12"x9" - Graphite on 50lb acid-free bond paper
Mouse Pups (2017) - 9"x12" - Graphite on 50lb acid-free bond paper
Relaxed Rabbits (2016) - 12"x9" - Graphite on 50lb acid-free bond paper
Sleepy Hound (2017) - 12"x9" - Black colored pencil on 50lb acid-free bond paper
Add-Ons
Add-on anything to anything! An Add-On lets you pledge for more than one tier by adding the price of any additional tier to your existing pledge. Say you want to include an extra book? Simply add-on an additional $35 to your pledge and let us know. You will also need to double the shipping charge. If you have any questions we are here to help.
Shipping Schedule
We expect to have your pledges shipped to you in November 2018. The designs for the books and prints are nearly completed. We expect to send everything to the printer within two weeks after the completion of this campaign if we hit our goal. It takes approximately three months for everything to be printed, and then to be delivered to us. We will ship them to everyone in early November immediately upon their arrival at our Flesk warehouse in Santa Cruz, CA.
All books are shipped within the U.S.A. by USPS Mail and will include tracking. Premium signed giclée prints shipped in the U.S.A. will ship by USPS First Class mail (small prints) or Priority Mail (large prints) and will include tracking.
The items shipped to our international friends usually take 3 weeks for delivery to your local post office, but can sometimes take up to 3-6 weeks depending on the country. Note that customs for your local country may hold on to packages for a week or longer and incur additional charges that are the responsibility of the backer. We know that shipping overseas is very expensive and we wish it was cheaper, too! We help by subsidizing some of the shipping cost. We make no money from the shipping.
Pastoral and all artwork is trademark and © 2018 J.A.W. Cooper. All Rights Reserved.
Video and text used for this campaign is © 2018 J.A.W. Cooper and Flesk Publications. All Rights Reserved.
fleskpublications.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Why you should trust Flesk Publications? John Fleskes answers:

I pride myself on having a sixteen year record of delivering over eighty books of the highest quality. I've run ten previous Kickstarter campaigns with artists such as Brom, Frank Cho, J.A.W. Cooper, Jeffrey Alan Love, Gary Gianni and Mike Mignola (Hellboy: Into the Silent Sea Studio Edition), Petar Meseldzija, Richard and Wendy Pini (Elfquest), Mark Schultz, and Daren Bader and Lance HaunRogue. Most of these have been on time. We are very open with our backers and communicate through updates often to keep you up to date.

In some cases, things don't always go exactly as planned in the publishing world. Much of the time they do, but sometimes an unexpected problem or delay arises. In the rare case that this happens, simply put, I deal with it and find a way to get the job done. I am very open about any challenges and like to share in the process so people know what's going on. I don't like surprises, and don't feel anyone else should either. I respect the artist, and our supporters too much to let them down. The good thing is that I've published over eighty books and I know how to get them shipped and delivered, and I know how to manage a schedule and keep projects on track, and I will stay motivated and energized to get the books into your hands when I said I would.

I can't thank everyone enough who has supported us before. You directly help us to make these beautiful books.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
This just in: thanks to your early enthusiasm and support, we have announced a stretch goal of $65k, and a new Kickstarter-exclusive project! Read all about it here.
Ursula K. Le Guin is best known for her groundbreaking, visionary, bestselling science fiction and fantasy novels, but throughout her life, she wrote, read, and believed in the power of poetry.
“I just knew from extremely early on—it sounds ridiculous, but five or six—that writing was something I was going to do, always... It started as poetry.”
Photo courtesy Euan Monaghan/Structo
When Le Guin brought the manuscript for her final collection, So Far So Good, to Copper Canyon Press, she did so with faith in us as a nonprofit, independent publisher to do justice to her poetry. As huge fans of her writing and ethos, we were thrilled to accept the book for publication. We were deeply saddened when Le Guin passed away in January of 2018, just days after she sent her last edits to what would be her final poetry book. This tremendous loss strengthened our resolve: Let’s do all we can to lift up the poetic legacy of this essential American writer.
So now we invite you to join us in a rare opportunity: Help publish Ursula K. Le Guin’s final collection of poetry! The book, So Far So Good, will be published in the fall of 2018—thanks to your help. This will truly be a community effort, and a community’s book. In fact, to honor this community element we want to print your name, or the name of a loved one, in every copy of the first edition of the book, when you back the project at $100 or more. Scroll down to “about the publisher” to learn more about our nonprofit publishing model, and read on for much more about the incredible Ursula K. Le Guin and her poetry.
Ursula K. Le Guin, award-winning novelist, poet, avid feminist, and environmentalist, passed away on Monday, January 22, 2018 in Portland, Oregon. In addition to being the author of more than 20 novels, she has written 12 collections of poetry, more than 100 short stories, several collections of essays, 13 books for children, and five volumes of translation. Her books have been translated into more than 40 languages and have sold millions of copies worldwide.
She is known for her vast contribution to the genres of science fiction and fantasy with books including the Earthsea series, The Left Hand of Darkness, and The Dispossessed, which made her the first person to win both the Hugo and Nebula Awards for Best Novel twice for the same two books. In April 2000, the U.S. Library of Congress dubbed Le Guin a Living Legend in the “Writers and Artists” category for her significant contributions to America’s cultural heritage. In 2002, she won a PEN/Malamud Award, and in 2003, she was made a Science Fiction and Fantasy Writers of America (SFWA) Grand Master, one of only a few women writers to take the top honor in the genre. In 2014, she was awarded the National Book Foundation Medal for Distinguished Contribution to American Letters.
“Where I can get prickly and combative is if I’m just called a sci-fi writer. I’m not. I’m a novelist and poet. Don’t shove me into your damn pigeonhole, where I don’t fit, because I’m all over. My tentacles are coming out of the pigeonhole in all directions.”
Le Guin's final book of poems, So Far So Good, will be published in the fall of 2018—with your help—by Copper Canyon Press.
Here is one example of the powerful, often short, wise poems in the book we’ll publish together. You hear Silky, Margaret, and Ella reading some lines from this poem in our campaign video. 
So Far So Good showcases Le Guin’s spiritual depth, quiet humor, and deep passion. She contemplates approaching the end of life with an equal sense of awe, mystery, and urgency that characterized her best-selling novels, but here the work is personal and sometimes nearly whispered—a voice speaking from the heart of the author.
Photograph by Rod Searcey. © Rod Searcey
Here are some words from Le Guin’s poetry editor and a few longtime readers of her fiction, on what it’s like to discover her poetry:
“It was a tremendous privilege to work with Ursula on her latest book. Like many great writers, she has been writing poems for much of her life, even while she saw her fame and recognition coming from other genres. This new collection is intimate and personal, and throughout the editing process she revealed a tremendous graciousness and receptivity, even while admitting to feeling a degree of vulnerability in the genre. Unsurprisingly, it’s a gorgeous book that celebrates the living even as she contemplates mortality.” 
—Michael Wiegers, Editor in Chief at Copper Canyon Press
“She's been such a guide for so long in the work that she's done: in terms of how we think about the world, how we think about political systems, how we think about race and gender and class and relating to each other. Now it's in her poetry; she's a guide for how to process the world in different ways, how to process the environment, your day to day life, how you process the end of your life. ” 
—Silky Shah, longtime Le Guin reader and Executive Director, Detention Watch Network
"It's interesting seeing Le Guin’s themes manifesting in different ways, through different uses of words. Her other books are largely fantasy, or science fiction. Her poetry is much more grounded in the real world—but a real world that feels mystical, and still has a sort of magic to it." 
—Ella Wiegers, longtime Le Guin reader and student
"It felt like she was speaking my heart, my mind, something that I know but I never could've put into words. This was somebody that I felt like I knew.” 
—Margaret Schonfield, longtime Le Guin reader and dancer/psychologist
“I’ve had a long career as a writer, and a good one, in good company. Here at the end of it, I don’t want to watch American literature get sold down the river. We who live by writing and publishing want and should demand our fair share of the proceeds; but the name of our beautiful reward isn’t profit. Its name is freedom.”
—Ursula K. Le Guin
Our headquarters in Port Townsend, Washington
For more than 45 years, Copper Canyon Press has been operating as an independent publisher dedicated to poetry. Our nonprofit status enables and requires us to place art above profit, and creative freedom above the whims of the marketplace. We are able to operate in the name of aesthetic excellence and cultural relevance, specifically because you and other visionary community members share this value, essential to a healthy climate for the arts. For this reason we were particularly proud when the Ursula K. Le Guin—none other than the literary legend herself—chose to bring her poetry collection to Copper Canyon Press.
Not unlike independent record companies and public radio stations, we rely on the support of donors like you, who share our belief that poetry is vital to language and living. The Kickstarter community in particular has helped us to publish major collections including Then Come Back: The Lost Poems of Pablo Neruda, The Essential W.S. Merwin, and Aimee Nezhukumatathil's Oceanic. We are proud to publish extraordinary poetry—in collaboration and community with you.
...and Realists of a Larger Reality
While Le Guin is best known for her major contributions to the genres of science fiction and fantasy, she was also a great poet. One of the fiercest advocates of our time for literature as a mode of social justice, her outspoken values shifted the literary landscape—a rare and invaluable combination. 
“Hard times are coming, when we’ll be wanting the voices of writers who can see alternatives to how we live now, can see through our fear-stricken society and its obsessive technologies to other ways of being, and even imagine real grounds for hope. We’ll need writers who can remember freedom—poets, visionaries—realists of a larger reality.”
—Ursula K. Le Guin, from a speech at the National Book Awards, 2014
Photo by Win Goodbody
When you back this project, you will help readers everywhere rediscover Le Guin: as a poet, and will enable Copper Canyon Press to continue to keep poetry publishing independent. Le Guin saw the role of the poet as visionary citizen, capable to envision a different way forward through difficult times. We see it as an honor and urgent obligation to continue this good work.
As a nonprofit publisher of poetry, only half of our overall operational expenses are covered by book sales, so each pledge helps us to sustain our community-powered model of getting poetry into the hands of those who’ll benefit from its power.
This just in: thanks to your early enthusiasm and support, we have announced both a stretch goal, and a new Kickstarter-exclusive project! Read all about it here.
When you pledge $100 or more to the project, your name (or the name of a loved one) will be printed in every copy of So Far So Good, soon to be on bookshelves all over the world and in the Library of Congress, alongside Le Guin's other great works. At $25 and above, you'll receive a copy of the book when it is hot off the press, before it's been widely distributed. 
In thanks for your support of So Far So Good, you can also receive: 
A beautiful letterpress broadside featuring a previously unpublished poem from the book 
A selection of other Copper Canyon Press books: an entire fall season, an editor-curated package of bestsellers, or every single book from our annual list. 
We at Copper Canyon Press are grateful for people like you who value poetry and the vitality it brings to readers. Thank you!
Illustrated portrait of Ursula K. Le Guin by Emily Comfort
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are far enough along in the production process to excitedly anticipate a fall 2018 publication date for SO FAR SO GOOD. To get there will require a generous and supportive group effort from poetry readers, Le Guin fans, and the Kickstarter community. Now we begin the work of reaching all the people we believe will feel connected to her poems, and together we will move this extraordinary book of poetry out into the world.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: The Copper Canyon Press VIP Package
support.descp:
Be our guest and join us at Copper Canyon Press in Port Townsend, WA, for our lively, annual December celebration: includes a VIP tour and backstage look into the history and workings of the Press, dinner with key staff, and a poetry reading by a current Copper Canyon Press poet. Alternate December celebration in Seattle also available. At this level, you become a Copper Canyon Press Subscribing Patron, receiving all books that we publish for a year. Additionally, you will receive all premium gifts listed above, including your name or the name of a loved one printed in SO FAR SO GOOD and your own copy hot of the press. (December event dates TBD; does not include airfare or lodging.)
Please note, backers at this level will need to submit their desired name by July 9 in order for it to appear in the book. We will send you a survey after the campaign.

Dear Backers of Ursula K. Le Guin: A Poet’s Legacy, 
With 10 hours left, we are $2,000 from our stretch goal! Help us reach $65,000 by 5pm Pacific Time today! Your contributions will make it possible to move TWO Le Guin poetry books into production: her final poetry collection, So Far So Good, and her very first (1975), Wild Angels. 
This is the last chance to:

“Dragons are one of the truths about us. We have no other way of expressing that particular truth about us. Those who deny the existence of dragons are often eaten by dragons. From within.”
Dear Backers of ,

Dear Backer of Ursula K. Le Guin: A Poet’s Legacy, 
We are thrilled at our progress towards the stretch goal of $65k by June 28th! This will allow us to move both So Far So Good and Wild Angels, Le Guin's first poetry chapbook, into production after the campaign closes—and all backers at $25 and above will be entitled to both books. To get us excited about reaching that next goal, we have a treasure to share with you today:
A First Glimpse & Listen into

Dear Backers,
We have huge news! 
Copper Canyon Press has secured rights to a limited printing of Ursula K. Le Guin’s first poetry chapbook, Wild Angels—originally published in 1975, and currently out of print.

campaign.story:
Hi! My name is Francine Bridge - i'm also known online as Witnesstheabsurd, and i'm a freelance digital illustrator with an investment in monsters. Last year I ran a campaign to print my first artbook, the Occult Supergiant Primer and thanks to everyone who supported it was a terrific success. I always intended to publish more books and now, i'm here to try something a little more ambitious!
The Lesser Key of Solomon is an occult text containing the "Ars Goetia" - a list of 72 demons that can be summoned and commanded by mortals. The Goetic demons have long been a source of inspiration for artists and have received many different interpretations much like the Tarot. I've always wanted to produce my own version, and now I am!
THE BASICS
I want to print 100 copies of a roughly 80 page hardback artbook featuring illustrations of 72 demons alongside their original seals and the text describing their nature and abilities.
I've completed 7 of these 72 demons right now. Funding this project will go towards not only printing but also permit me to take less commissions from outside clients and focus on completion of the book over the next few months.
Of those 72, a select few demons among those listed as "Kings of Hell" will receive oversize double page illustrations such as Bael, Asmoday and Belial.
Mockup Page
Backers at the "Marquis of Hell" and above tiers will have first dibs on copies, with 90 copies available at the reduced price of £25/$33. Shipping is £5/$7 for outside the UK and £3/$4 for inside the UK/Ireland.
The remaining 10 copies + any unsold will be sold afterwards at £30/$40 each, with the chance of a second print run if the campaign is a success, but no guarantees! PDFs will be available at £12/$15 and above, and will be on sale after the campaign ends.
Any additional funds over the funding target of £900 will go to increasing the number of available copies, upping production values and hopefully providing special extra goodies such as foil card versions of demons and fun special artifacts!
Completing and publishing the Occult Supergiant Primer was an unbelievable event for me - the outpouring of support I received has carried me to this day. The Goetia, like the OSP, represents a dream project, a chance to accomplish something impossible without that same support. I hope I can continue to make these dreams something real you can hold!
 Special thanks to Samantha Carter for the use of her music 
EDIT 23/05/2018
Stretch Goals!
In light of the amazing outpouring of support so far i'm pleased to announce our first Stretch Goal -
£7000 - Custom trading cards featuring the Goetia will be enclosed with all physical copies - details coming soon!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
have attempted to minimize risks and challenges through careful preparation.

- I have a draft mockup template for pages prepared and the greater part of the demons already planned at a thumbnail stages. All that's required is time!
- I have secured a print quote for the amount and quality of books I wish to publish from a printer 
- Shipping for each copy has been calculated and appended to the tiers.
- Having completed and shipped my last artbook successfully I am familiar with the process of both running a KS campaign and delivering on the promised outcome.

Potential remaining risks include an inability to complete the remaining paintings in the event of a loss of equipment or other emergency or a similar loss of function with respect to the printing/shipping process, however neither of these scenarios are likely. 

Funds will support both completion of the project and printing. I've set a rough deadline for completion and delivery by November 2018 - this could potentially change in the event of potential delays in production, but i'll be striving to meet the deadline as promised!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
We are super lucky and excited to introduce one of Imaginism Studios' newer artists, Masae Seki! To celebrate, we asked her to put together an art book of whatever she wanted. Bobby Chiu also wanted to join in on the fun so he's making a book as well!
Masae learned that families are often different but love is the same. In this book about family, she reflects through illustration on her fond memories and moments with her family. 
Masae dedicates this book to her parents who showered her with love and support, teaching her the importance of pursuing what she loves. After losing both parents, Masae felt in the beginning that drawing her memories with her family was the best way to cope with her emotions. As she created more and more family drawings, she wanted to share her stories and allow other people to connect to them. So she decided to create this book, "Kin". 
With 72 pages of illustrations and sketches, "Kin" features many human, animal, and creature designs! Some of these are accompanied by short stories while in others, the pictures tell the tales. She hopes that people will view her illustrations each as a small celebration of love and family in its many forms, and they will also see their own families in some of the illustrations. 
Credits: Disney Publishing "Vampirina" Series, Netflix "12/24" 
When we hear the word "unicorn", the first thing that comes to mind is a horse with a single horn, surrounded by rainbows and butterflies. They are supposed to be majestic, fantastical, rare, and special. But Bobby felt that somewhere along the way, "unicorns" became tacky, cliche, and uncreative. Bobby saw more potential in unicorns than that! He wanted to bring back the cool things about unicorns, so he decided to collect a bunch of them to show the world -- unicorns that are weird and unusual. 
"Unusual Unicorns" is an art book filled with sketches and fully-colored illustrations of over 40 different types of unicorns. The book takes you into a world that no one has entered before; the possibilities of these unique unicorns are endless. 
Credits: Alice in Wonderland, Alice Through the Looking Glass, Men in Black III, Niko and the Sword of Light 
Each book is carefully bound in 8" x 10" inch hardcover, containing 72 pages of beautiful, full-color pages! It includes sketches, drawings, traditional watercolor, and digital paintings! 
Bobby and Masae will each have a new art print made especially for this Kickstarter! These will be included in every book exclusively for backers of this campaign, so now will be the only chance to get them! 
Through this Kickstarter, you will also have the chance to get your hands on ORIGINAL drawings and paintings of images that appear in the books! Check out the "Original Art Rewards" packages below to see which originals you can get! When you back one of these, you will receive both "Kin" and "Unusual Unicorns", 2 exclusive mystery prints, AND the original artwork listed! 
The art books also include contributions from an amazing list of guest artists!
There will only be 500 copies of each book available, so don't miss your chance to grab one! To help back this campaign, we offer package deals of both books for a great price!  
We have 10 more slots of New Original Art rewards open! 
If we reach the $40K mark, we will open up more new originals rewards with art that won't appear in the books, so it will very special and exclusive! There will be 10 new reward packages in total to give you more opportunities to purchase original art. 
*shipping & handling rates will apply
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have already over come most of the risk and challenges that come with Kickstarters for art books, such as completing all artwork, editing the files, finalizing the design and finding a manufacturing company. We are scheduled to have the books manufactured before the funding period ends, so we will start packaging up the rewards ready to ship as quickly as possible! We will be sending you a survey through Kickstarter, asking you for your shipping address.

We have run multiple successful Kickstarters in the past (Niko and the Sword of Light, and Schoolism Subscriptions) so this process is nothing new to us! We have also created 15 books in the past so we are familiar with the book-making process and confident that the quality will meet our expectations.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
"The Turning Shape" is an incredibly personal collection of work which was crafted largely over the past year, and the elements within the book can be seen as an exploration into my own psyche. 
Explore the Forest of the Self and encounter The Rabbit, The Witch, The Birds and the Wolf, along with many other beasts.
The Wolf and I
My name is Michelle and my online artist name is WolfSkullJack. I am a British artist living in the UK and I have been working in the art industry for over decade. It gives me tremendous joy to release my third self published art book, "The Turning Shape".  
"The Turning Shape" is brimming with traditional pieces of beasts, monsters, and creatures, all of which dwell within my subconscious. My art is many things - Mostly therapy, but also a journey into what it means to be human.
Original Artwork of La Loba and The Witch
New large originals
Wolf Girl original (sold out)
Phases Original
Buck Rabbit Original
Crow Original
Prints available
Shapeshift Tote bag
Dead inside but cute mini print FREE!
More stretch goals to be announced!!
FAQ  
Why Kickstarter? 
I'm using Kickstater as a preordering platform. The book is well underway already and i'm expecting to go to print as soon as the campaign has ended. This way I know how many to order!  Kickstater has been used previously for my last two art books which smashed their goals in a matter of hours. Both of these books have now sold out!
The great thing about using Kickstater is that I can get the funds upfront to pay for the printing costs, merchandise, and shipping materials. 
When will the books be shipped?
The plan is to get the books printed by the end of July and make a start on shipping in August. However, please allow up until November especially if your book requires a drawing or commission. I'll keep everyone fully up to date in the journal posts on Kickstarter! 
When will payment be taken? 
Please remember that payment will be taken at the END of the campaign, so please keep this in mind! Payments that fail at the end of the campaign will loose out on rewards. No reservations. 
How will you get my address?
When everything is ready to ship i'll be sending out a survey to collect any information I need to complete your order. Keep an eye out on the journal posts to let you know when the surveys are sent! You will also be sent an email.
Can I pay extra for tracked and signed shipping?
Yes! Tracked shipping tends to be double the amount of standard shipping and you can pay the extra amount by Paypal at the end of the campaign. Just drop me a message! I don't make a profit on shipping.
In regards to the commission slot, what is allowed and what isn't?
My strengths are in monsters, werewolves, animals, pets , skeletons or skulls. Please don't buy the slot if you want a commission of machinery, a human, a copyrighted character, hateful propaganda, sexual or pornographic images (although tasteful nudity is fine). You would be welcomed to get the piece tattooed if you wanted to! If you're not sure please drop me a message!
Is there any nudity or bad language?
There is no bad language. There is however some booty and tasteful nudity! Any nude character is not at all drawn in a sexual manner but more to reflect a natural state. 
Any other questions please just drop me a line!
Find more of my work on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/wolfskulljack_art
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This being my third Kickstarter project, I am confident I can handle any issues that may come our way! The book is about 80% ready to go, I just need the funds upfront to cover the printing costs.
I'll keep full communication throughout
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
AANNNDDD that's everyone's order out the door with the exception of the handful of people who still havnt filled out the address section in the survey!
Thank you so much to everyone for backing the project and I cannot thank you enough for your kindness and patience! 
If you're Canadian, please be aware that the postal strike has caused BIG delays up until 2019 so you may want to look out for that. Sadly this isn't something I could have predicted and it's likely that your order is in customs until they clear the backlog.

Greetings wolflings! 
I know a bunch of you are seeing a ton of photos of others who are receiving their books and you want to know if your book is on its way! Most have been sent out but there's still another 160 left to go and those books that require drawings in will take a little longer. However my original goal to get everything dispatched in or by November is still on track!
All of the Early Bird books, Buddy bundles and most of the standard book have gone.

updates.update_userinfo: What may be delaying your order
updates.update_content:
Greetings backers!
Over half the orders have been dispatched and we are well within our estimated dispatch date which i'm really happy with! 
Only 271 orders to go and i'm REALLY hoping I can get everything gone before I get married on the 31st October. Yes, that's right i'm getting hitched on Halloween because i'm a spooky ass bitch!

352 more to go!! Considering my dispatch date is Novemeber, we aren't doing too badly!! Ideally I want these books shipped as soon as possible and I'm working my arse off to try and make this happen.
Thank you for your patience, we are getting there!
29 of you still havnt filled out the survey and I need this information to send out your order! Please log in, click on the Turning Shape Project and there should be a tab which will allow you to fill out the survey.

updates.update_userinfo: Books will start to go out
updates.update_content:
Greetings backers!!
I know I said the dispatch dates will be Novemeber, but honestly, that is a worst case senario. The books that require drawings in them WILL take a little longer but I'm going to start with the less complicated books just to get them shifted! 
I'm having a 'packing party' on Tuesday where I basically entice my friends over with the promise of pizza but instead put them to work on a factory floor!

HUGE thank you to everyone who came to see me at today's book signing and picked up their books! 
At one point 4 cuties came in all wearing the same WolfSkullJack tee which has totally made my day!!

They have arrived and I'm SO HAPPY with the upgrades! I paid extra for uncoated thicker pages and they look and feel gorgeous. 
What a relief!! As I had opted to make changes from the proof I was a little unsure how the book would turn out, but I'm so pleased with them.
The book signing is going ahead tomorrow, if you are collecting a book you guys MUST let me know that you're coming otherwise I might not take your order with me!

project_data.project_name: The Turning Shape

campaign.story:
Welcome to The Thousand Demon Tree by Jeffrey Alan Love Kickstarter campaign! Written and drawn by Jeffrey Alan Love, this wordless graphic novel comes in three editions: a trade hardcover, a deluxe signed hardcover edition, and a special deluxe edition that includes an original painting. We also have three luxurious giclée signed prints available. Please read on for the full details for each. Every pledge comes with a Kickstarter exclusive bonus postcard set. Thank you!

The Deluxe Signed Hardcover Book and the Premium Signed Giclée Prints are only available to our Kickstarter supporters during this campaign.

All book or print pledges of $30 or more come with a set of six 4 x 6" postcards featuring art from The Thousand Demon Tree!
All book or print pledges of $30 or more include a new 30 minute art demonstration video exclusive to our Kickstarter supporters! Please read the stretch goal section for more details.
Drawn into a strange quest by a bird and a sword, a lone warrior travels across a silent landscape of smoke and dirt and bone. Transformed by what he encounters along the way, he searches for the Thousand Demon Tree, and the hope of a new world that lies beyond it.
Interior painted pages for The Thousand Demon Tree by Jeffrey Alan Love.

Trade Hardcover Book

The Thousand Demon Tree by Jeffrey Alan Love is 96 page, 9 x 12 inch hardcover wordless graphic novel with printed cover boards.
Deluxe Signed Hardcover Book

Only available to our Kickstarter supporters during this campaign! This deluxe hardcover version comes with a red quarter binding (custom material wrap to spine area that extends into the front and back covers) with black spine stamp. In addition, a unique page with a piece of art exclusive to this edition will be printed and bound into the book and signed by Jeffrey Alan Love. This edition will only be available direct from us.
Deluxe Signed Hardcover Book, Plus Original Painting

This version is limited to only 100 copies. The book comes with an acrylic and ink original painting on 5" x 6" Stonehenge paper. Note that the art is not painting inside the book. It's on a separate piece of paper. The art subject matter is left to the discretion of the artist. All art will be shipped at random. No requests please.
Premium Signed Giclée Prints
Only available to our Kickstarter supporters during this campaign! Signed luxurious museum quality giclée prints featuring Jeffrey Alan Love's artwork from The Thousand Demon Tree. There are three images at three sizes to choose from. These prints utilizes 290 gsm acid free matte paper that is water resistant and is printed with archival and fade resistant inks.
Print 1 -- This 11 x 17" signed print features an original piece of the Lone Warrior from The Thousand Demon Tree by Jeffrey Alan Love. This art is exclusive to this print and is not found in the book.
Print 2 -- This 13 x 19" signed print features the dynamic story splash from The Thousand Demon Tree shown in print sample.
Print 3 -- This oversized 18 x 24" signed print features the cover art with the custom type logo of The Thousand Demon Tree book.
If you would like more than one print simply add its cost to your pledge for each additional print. Feel free to message us if you need help.
All book or print pledges of $30 or more come with a set of six 4 x 6" postcards featuring art from The Thousand Demon Tree!

This item will be available nowhere else and is exclusive to this campaign. This is just one way we would like to thank you for supporting us!
All Kickstarter bonus items are limited to one per backer.
Thank you for helping us to hit our initial goal that will allow us to publish this book.

Stretch Goal #1 Unlocked! We will add an additional three bonus postcards for everyone who makes a book or print pledge of $30 or more! There are now six postcards total.
Stretch Goal #2 Unlocked! -- We will include a new 30 minute art demonstration video exclusive to our Kickstarter supporters! This will be available to anyone who makes a book or print pledge of $30 or more.
In the video, Jeff will talk about how he works for clients and for his own projects. He'll also show examples of thumbnail sketches, and he'll talk about what he thinks about when he composes a picture. Jeff will show the process of a finished piece from sketch to final painting, while showing the materials and techniques that he uses.
This video will appeal equally to artists who are looking to advance their own craft, and to fans to get an inside look at how Jeff tells a story with his art. We will be making this video available online that you can stream from any of your devices.
All Kickstarter stretch goal bonus items are limited to one per backer.
Add-on anything to anything! An Add-On lets you pledge for more than one tier by adding the price of any additional tier to your existing pledge. Say you want to include an extra signed book? Simply add-on an additional $40 to your pledge and let us know. You will also need to double the shipping charge. If you have any questions we are here to help.
We expect to have your pledges shipped to you in August 2018. The designs for the books and prints are completed. We will send them to the printer immediately upon the completion of this campaign if we hit our goal. It takes approximately three months for everything to be printed, then to be delivered to us. We will ship them to everyone in mid-August immediately upon their arrival at our Flesk warehouse in Santa Cruz, CA.
All books are shipped within the U.S.A. by USPS Mail and will include tracking. Premium signed giclée prints shipped in the U.S.A. will ship by USPS First Class mail (small prints) or Priority Mail (large prints) and will include tracking.
The items shipped to our international friends usually take 3 weeks for delivery to your local post office, but can sometimes take up to 3-6 weeks depending on the country. Note that customs for your local country may hold on to packages for a week or longer and incur additional charges that are the responsibility of the backer. We know that shipping overseas is very expensive and we wish it was cheaper, too! We help by subsidizing some of the shipping cost. We make no money from the shipping.
 Jeff's Thoughts on Working with John Fleskes
I love working with John because he makes beautiful books. It's as simple as that. He is a master craftsman, and I know that he will bring the same level of attention and care into bringing the book into the world as I did in creating the work within it. I could not have been happier with our first book together, Notes From The Shadowed City, and I can't wait to see what he does with The Thousand Demon Tree.
John's Thoughts on Working with Jeffrey Alan Love
I was mesmerized with Jeff's work from the moment I first saw it. I could tell immediately that this was an artist with that rare individual voice that could speak in soft tones, yet have a strong commanding presence through his art. Upon meeting Jeff I found someone with an equal passion and commitment to making art and books that had a genuine purpose. He is humble, one of the best storytellers and designers who I've met, and someone who lets his work speak for itself. It's a joy to work with Jeff--especially when I get to see each new work for the first time, and during the excitement that comes while we brainstorm ideas. It's pure pleasure to have this opportunity to bring his work into the viewers hands.
Jeffrey Alan Love is an award-winning artist and writer whose clients have included the New York Times, TIME, The New Yorker, Scholastic, HarperCollins, Tor, Gollancz, and others. Winner of the World Fantasy Award for Best Artist, a gold medal from the Society of Illustrators, a Silver Spectrum Fantastic Art Award, and two Academy of British Cover Design Awards, he has been nominated for The British Fantasy Award, The British Science Fiction Award, and the Chesley Award.
A message from the Publisher, John Fleskes: What Kickstarter offers is the opportunity to create and do what we love, while connecting and giving back to our supporters in a personal way. This makes the process much more enjoyable than if we simply worked behind closed doors. It is also gratifying to have the opportunity to continually add value to the project through stretch goals. I've never felt that we are making products. Instead, we are making unique art books and prints. This is done with great care to best allow us to showcase Jeff's art in a way that we can be proud of. We hope that you will cherish them just as much as we do.
The Thousand Demon Tree is trademark and © 2018 Jeffrey Alan Love. All Rights Reserved.
Video and text used for this campaign is © 2018 Jeffrey Alan Love and Flesk Publications. All Rights Reserved.
jeffreyalanlove.com
fleskpublications.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Why you should trust Flesk Publications? John Fleskes answers:

I pride myself on having a sixteen year record of delivering over eighty books of the highest quality. I've run eight previous Kickstarter campaigns with artists such as Brom, Frank Cho, J.A.W. Cooper, Gary Gianni and Mike Mignola (Hellboy: Into the Silent Sea Studio Edition), Petar Meseldzija, Richard and Wendy Pini (Elfquest), Mark Schultz, and Daren Bader and Lance HaunRogue. Most of these have been on time. We are very open with our backers and communicate through updates often to keep you up to date.

In some cases, things don't always go exactly as planned in the publishing world. Much of the time they do, but sometimes an unexpected problem or delay arises. In the rare case that this happens, simply put, I deal with it and find a way to get the job done. I am very open about any challenges and like to share in the process so people know what's going on. I don't like surprises, and don't feel anyone else should either. I respect the artist, and our supporters too much to let them down. The good thing is that I've published over eighty books and I know how to get them shipped and delivered, and I know how to manage a schedule and keep projects on track, and I will stay motivated and energized to get the books into your hands when I said I would.

I can't thank everyone enough who has supported us before. You directly help us to make these beautiful books.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi, everyone,
The Thousand Demon Tree is progressing well at the printer. I have reviewed and approved the proofs. This is my last chance to check the printing quality and to review the materials to make sure it prints the way I want it to. I'll keep you updated on the shipping news just as soon as the book is ready. I ended up ordering a specialty paper for the quarter binding on the deluxe version. It added two weeks to the schedule, but I think it is worth it to improve upon the book.

updates.update_userinfo: Book Update! The Thousand Demon Tree by Jeffrey Alan Love
updates.update_content:
Hi, everyone,
I turned in The Thousand Demon Tree into the printer on Sunday. I spent the weekend reviewing, packaging, and triple checking every aspect of the book before passing it along to the printer. They let me know that it is on track for a delivery to our warehouse in mid-August. I'll keep you updated and let you know once we start shipping you your goodies!

campaign.story:
Six years ago, SenshiStock and jademacalla got together for a fantastic photoshoot that resulted in loads of amazing action and dramatic pose references. 
We're DOING IT AGAIN! YAY!
Joining us for another amazing weekend of poses will be null-entity and PirateLotus-Stock! We will have two professional photographers, MANY exciting props, and tons of ideas for action, perspective, and drama. We will also be making composed group shots and doing casual interactions. 
The funds raised from the initial goal covers the domestic and international travel (~ $2300), lodging and food expenses for the trip for four people (~$1600), studio rental & fees (~$500) plus fees and taxes (~$1600). 
We have a few stretch goals when you help us exceed the initial goal!
Travel Locations For Models
At $7000 we will unlock underwater images. GROUP UNDERWATER IMAGES. With WEAPONS?! 8D Plus, we will unlock daring aerial feats with harnesses and other hanging/flying people!
At $7700, the images in the Backer Exclusives and Basic Set rewards double, plus we add Outtakes to the $25 level. We also unlock multi-camera shots of group poses AKA sets that show the same poses from more than one point of view.
If we keep going, we will start adding more models and make this epic event even MORE amazing! 
Pledge to this project now and help us get together for this most excellent pose reference collaboration!
Sarah AKA SenshiStock has been shooting images for artist pose reference for 10 years. She likes Sailor Moon, cats, chocolate, and audio books.
Jade Macalla is a freelancer with an interesting wardrobe and a diverse skill set. One of those skills is acting goofy in front of a camera.
Erin is a pirate cat. She likes Type O- and Highland cows, and she hates loud noises and crumbs. Oh, and she does stock.
Kyle AKA Null-Entity is a Pro Rubber Duck Wrangler and avid METAL fan, He loves diving into stacks of mattresses for fun when not making aprons manly.
Blue usually takes pictures of dogs but these people are pretty wild so we think she'll do a great job.
CREDITS
Thanks to Justin Nyquist for his amazing video VO.
Video template is Adobe After Effects Heatwave.
Many thanks to Monplaisir for the epic music!
Credit to jagged-eye for the explosion backgrounds.
We thank vecteezy for the world map.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Everyone involved in this project is experienced and has a history of delivering services and rewards as expected. Some risks to the project include possible travel delays. We've built travel buffer days around the shoot to help account for this possibility. 

Rewards will be delivered via downloads so there's no risk of lost shipments. Please make sure you regularly check the email associated with your Kickstarter account so you don't miss important messages from us! 

If you have any concerns, please let us know!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Everyone should have links in their messages for the downloads. I will go through the Backer Reports tonight and send additional emails to people who requested them. I have tested all the download links and they are all functional. Should you have any issues with them, please let me know as soon as possible. 

We CAN'T WAIT to see what kind of art you all make from these amazing images. ♥

Hello all! Blue sent the links for the second day of shooting over this morning so I'm in the process of downloading those now. 
We have over 1100 poses from across the two days. Once everything is organized, I will be making new ZIPs to send out to backers at all tiers. Stay tuned!! I am hoping to get them all sent today!! ♥

Filling you all in that our editing is about half done. Commissioners all have their images and Blue is working on the second day of the shoot now. I anticipate having all the rewards out to you in the upcoming weeks! Let me know if you have any questions in the meantime. 

Meanwhile, here's a video we took during the shoot!

The editing of over 1000 photos is currently underway! YAY! We're not sure how many will be in the final download ZIP(s), but safe to say, we made a LOT of pose references! :D

Stay tuned for download info coming as soon as it can. Massive thanks to Blue, our photographer, who's working on ALL the post work. ♥
Come hang out with us! https://youtu.be/PpjDS_zpbEk
Hey! We're heading to FL today! YAY! Shoot starts tomorrow 10AM.
